long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reading assistant for people with reading difficulty. A selection of text can be fetched from any page open in a browser and presented in an extension window; divided into easy to read segments, with the first letter of each word made bold. The color scheme has also been optimised to be the most readable contrast possible.
